name: Elizabeth
testimonial: We have many great positions available that most people don't even know about. CareerPathway.com is like a continuous job fair but it requires far less effort from our team.

name: Jane Smith
testimonial: Resources such as CareerPathway.com are crucial to developing a workforce that meets the needs of our community and aligns with the goals of our Vitality Lincoln Strategic Plan.

name: Alice Johnson
testimonial: CareerPathway.com gives us an easy tool to use that broadens our career exploration resources and helps our teachers and counselors better understand each student’s unique interests – helping schools accomplish one of those important outcomes.
